DOC.brief_summary: This study aim verify combination low calorie diet orange juice consumption result weight loss ameliorates metabolic obesity-related biomarkers .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Low-calorie Diet Orange Juice Body Weight Metabolic Parameters Obese Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Seventy-eight obese subject age 36 ± 1 year BMI 33 ± 3 kg randomly divide two parallel group : ( 1 ) orange juice ( n = 39 ) , composed individual subject diet low caloric diet plus intake 500 ml orange juice ; ( 2 ) control ( n = 39 ) compose individual subject diet low calorie . The recruitment process begin September 2015 , intervention carry October 2015 January 2016 , data analysis start February 2016 . The sample number take account variance body weight type I error α = 0.05 type II error β = 0.2 ( 80 % power ) . The minimum sample size 36 individual per group ( n = 72 ) , consider approximately 15 % dropout rate . Thus , final sample size study constitute 39 individual per group ( n = 78 ) . Primary secondary endpoint reduction weight modification level obesity-related metabolic biomarkers , respectively . Normality homogeneity data test . T-test conduct identify possible difference OJ control group baseline . A linear mixed-effects model apply determine time effect within group ( post hoc ) , P significance set ≤ 0.05 . The assessment body composition , metabolic biomarkers food intake analyze 12-week intervention .
DOC.criteria: 30 > BMI < 40 kg/m2 Dieting last year , Use drug , vitamin dietary supplement Alcohol consumption ( > 20 g alcohol/d ) Intense physical activity ( > 5 hours/week ) .
